nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, Jedi Master General Kit Fisto and Laser Company, a Republic clone trooper unit, fought a battle on the planet Kessel against an anti-Republic force during the Clone Wars. Except for the trooper Checkers, all members of Laser Company were killed during the fight, and Checkers himself was badly wounded.
The battle of Kessel was first mentioned in Clone Wars Gambit: Stealth, a 2009 novel written by Karen Miller.
